name: Future Posts with password
author: Pablo LÃ³pez

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to send someone a link with a key in the URL so that they can visualize a future post without needing to be logged in.

If you want to send someone a post for review before publication, now you can, without a user being logged.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation (or install it directly from your dashboard) and then activate it from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation (or install it directly from your dashboard) and then activate it from Plugins page.

How it works?

If you have a future post, you will see a field appears on the edit screen of your post for assign a key. Enter a password and save your posts. A link appears with URL + Key, so you can send someone to review.
